snippet.title: Lingering Souls Trailer
snippet.description:
Upcoming Post Soviet Psychological Horror Realism Game: Lingering Souls.
Public Prologue demo now available! https://azagamestudio.itch.io/lingering-souls
Artyom's sister has passed away in his parents old apartment.
Now you must search the apartment for things you want to keep in her memory. She had a camera she particularly loved, which you intend to keep.

Full game featuring
    Photorealistic soviet era apartment
    Clean visuals with a realistic fish-eye effect to further increase immersion.
    A haunting lingering presence from the past.
    Randomized Audio System.
    Randomized Haunt System.
    No looping hallways.
    A twisted story about a family relative.
    Exploration and puzzles.
    Atmospheric visuals and realistic audio design.
    2-3 hours gameplay.
    Unique camera mechanics.

All footage is WIP and does not represent the final quality of the game.

Created by Aza Game Studio.
Follow: https://twitter.com/AzaGameStudio
Itch: https://azagamestudio.itch.io/
Sountrack composed and produced by "Vivek Abhishek"
@VIVEKABHISHEK
